description: The name and the failure policy of an initializer, and what resources it applies to.

name.description: The identifier of the initializer. It will be added to the object that needs to be initialized. Name should be fully qualified, e.g., '`alwayspullimages.kubernetes.io`', where '`alwayspullimages`' is the name of the webhook, and '`kubernetes.io`' is the name of the organization.

rules.description: The resources/subresources the initializer cares about. The initializer cares about an operation if it matches _any_ Rule. `rule.resources` must not include subresources.
